title: Australia Flights from $1,573+ R/T, Inc. Free Stopovers
text:
Home > Flight Deals > Australia Flights from $1,573+ R/T, Inc. Free Stopovers Australia Flights from $1,573+ R/T, Inc. Free Stopovers October 22, 2015 1:37pm by Patricia Magaña , SmarterTravel Staff Tweet 
Qantas' new promotion features discounted flights from the U.S. to Sydney, Melbourne, and Brisbane, with free stopovers, starting at from $1,573 round-trip, taxes and fees included. Departures are valid from four U.S. airports (LAX, SFO, DFW, JFK).

Qantas' new promotion features discounted flights from the U.S. to Sydney, Melbourne, and Brisbane, with free stopovers, starting at from $1,573 round-trip, taxes and fees included. Departures are valid from four U.S. airports (LAX, SFO, DFW, JFK). 
Qantas allows up to two stopovers—the first for free and the second at $100—which is a great opportunity to see two or even three destinations for the price of one flight. Available stopover destinations include Dallas/Fort Worth, Los Angeles, Brisbane, Melbourne, and Sydney. Honolulu stopovers are also available, though at an extra fee of $200. The minimum stay is at least seven days and the maximum stay is up to 12 months. Tickets must be booked by December 31, 2016. 
For Los Angeles: Outbound travel is valid Sunday through Wednesday during November 2 - 30, 2015, or during February 1 - March 31, 2016. For New York City: Outbound travel is valid November 9 - 30, 2015, or during February 1 - March 31, 2016. For Dallas: Outbound travel is valid February 1 - March 31, 2016. Thursday through Saturday travel is permitted for an additional fare. EDITOR'S OVERVIEW Where to Book: We found the best prices for the travel window of this sale by using a flexible date search, which can be accessed through our flight comparison tool to the right. You can find this promotion on the airline's sale page . Pros: Great for its free or cheap stopovers. Cons:
